Mathematics, Science & Technology/Video tape recorders and recording
description: Episode number 10 of Series "Video tech". This episode focuses on the camera crew - who's who and how they do their jobs. The size of the video crew depends on the size of the story to be presented, but there are three essential crew members - the presenter, the sound recordist and the camera operator. The role of each of these in the production of a video story is thoroughly examined.
